title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. This issue occurs when the key in the properties file is left blank but still has a valid value.
OB: The externalized text associated with the blank key is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text associated with the blank key should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key blank while providing a valid value. 3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
